comments_since_last_sample.body: too much giggling
Lol clicked on this coz I have the same couch, stayed for the tips
Fantastic job!!!

Haha, James is hilarious! I love the peel and stick ideas especially in a small place. I can relate to this. I’ve lived in a few rentals and they had the same rule. No paint and no drilling holes. It was difficult because I wanted to make my space look pretty.

I love the makeover! 😍
Where is Trono?  Is that near Toronto!

This is probably my favorite one so far. I have been following your channel for a while. I wait for your videos every Saturday.  Very relatable and accessible to most. 

I love what you have done with your place as well.

As an artist I would NEVER AGREE TO A LEASE LIKE THAT. ITS NOT RENTER FRIENDLY  THIS IS YOUR HOME YOU ARE PAYING A HUGE RENT AND YOU CAN'T HANG ANYTHING TO PERSONALIZE YOUR SPACE? that tells me that the landlord is UNREASONABLE and i wish she would have looked elsewhere.  Screw the view.
My favourite ❤ loved how this makeover turned out 🥰
Beautiful work guys!
You've gotten so full of yourself.
Hope Chico gets well super quickly !!!
Loved this makeover!

HI JAMES 💥💣🌞😁😍
GET  WELL SOON CHICO ☹🙃
Alexandra, I love your channel and I totally come here for you and your style but, James seems to be a fabulous human.
Love the challenge that this makeover provides. Please relay our regards to Chico - his health and a functioning hand with in-tact tendons is more important than one makeover!
Genius😲
Nice job!
I’m happy that duvet was changed. It’s weird how much a color just drowned out a lot in this corner of the room.
One of my favorite makeovers you’ve done!! Love all the small space choices 😍
Great ideas! The plant divider is inspirational 💡
